mapper.select: SELECT * FROM bulletin_board ORDER BY creation_date DESC LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{start};
mapper.update: update bulletin_board set view_count = view_count + 1 where board_id = #{board_id}
mapper.insert: insert into bulletin_board (member_no, title, content, author, creation_date) values(#{member_no}, #{title}, #{content}, #{author}, #{creation_date})
